pinyin: ai1 mo4 da4 yu2 xin1 si3

definitions.ai1 mo4 da4 yu2 xin1 si3: nothing sadder than a withered heart (idiom attributed to Confucius by Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3]); no greater sorrow than a heart that never rejoices; the worst sorrow is not as bad as an uncaring heart; nothing is more wretched than apathy;
